title: Yongzhe Donghua Xilie 2
synopsis:
In a fantasy world where humans and demons are long-time enemies, humans choose "Braves" as symbols of justice, while "Demons" are branded as evil.
But when the ancient demon god awakens, the war begins to blur the lines between right and wrong. Power, oppression, and prejudice begin to unravel, forcing every character to question:
What is justice? Who decides what is evil?
This isn't just a fantasy adventure—
It's a battle of beliefs, freedom, and breaking the labels that define us.

(Source: YouTube)
